constraints.name: probability_constraint
constraints.description: 选择的元素（骰子）必须满足在某种策略下，获胜概率至少为 1/2

constraints.name: repetition_avoidance
constraints.description: 如果两个元素（骰子）的结果相同，则重新选择直到结果不同
constraints.formal: if (result_A == result_B) then re-roll until (result_A != result_B)

constraints.name: no_winner_condition
constraints.description: 如果不存在满足条件的元素（骰子），则不输出任何赢家
constraints.formal: if (no die satisfies P(win | chosen_die) >= 1/2) then output 'No dice'
